Package com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search

Class BitsCollector

java.lang.Object
org.apache.lucene.search.SimpleCollector
com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search.BitsCollector
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.lucene.search.Collector, org.apache.lucene.search.LeafCollector
public class BitsCollector extends org.apache.lucene.search.SimpleCollector implements org.apache.lucene.search.Collector
Collect found documents as a set of docids in a bitSet. Caching should be ensure by user. 
 CollectorBits colBits = new CollectorBits(searcher);
 searcher.search(myQuery, colBits);
 final BitSet bits = colBits.bits();
 for (int docId = bits.nextSetBit(0), max = bits.length(); docId < max; docId = bits.nextSetBit(docId + 1)) {
     out.print(", " + docId);
 }

    • BitsCollector

      public BitsCollector(int maxDoc)
      Build collector from the maximum docId of the lucene reader IndexReader.maxDoc(). If maxDoc is too small for the index, errors may be thrown if docId > maxDoc are found.
      Parameters:
      maxDoc - Biggest docId + 1 for this lucene index.
